description:
Jenkins Block & Associates, P.C., is a highly respected law firm that has proudly served the people of both Virginia and Maryland since 1977. From our Richmond law office, which is conveniently located near the Office of Disability Adjudication and Review, we assist clients who need help pursuing not only Social Security Disability benefits, but also workers' compensation benefits, Supplemental Security Income and personal injury compensation.

Experienced attorney Corey R. Pollard leads our Richmond law office. Mr. Pollard earned his law degree from University of Richmond School of Law, and, since finishing law school, he has focused on protecting the rights of victims suffering from injuries and disabilities. He has gained extensive experience in his chosen practice areas at all levels, from administrative hearings to appellate motions, and he has a reputation as a skilled litigator and negotiator.

If you suffered an injury in a car accident or at the hands of a negligent medical professional, the law firm of Jenkins Block & Associates, P.C., can help you pursue compensation. If you have a permanent disability and are in need of Social Security Disability benefits to ensure your financial stability, we can help you as well. To learn more about the services offered at our Richmond law office, you can schedule a free initial consultation.
